item.title: Lights in Park not working., 23rd September
item.description:
Newly refurbished Riverside Gardens street lighting in both north east and north west corners not working making it extremely dark and dangerous. This has been the case for several weeks.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): West Street, Northumberland Heath, London

item.title: Holes in pavement, 23rd September
item.description:
Lots of holes in the pavement my son tripped over one today on the way home from school. When I took a closer look, I noticed there are many holes with weeds growing in them, making them hard to see. This is very dangerous. This isn’t footpath 123. My photos are not very clear but its a very big sinkhole on the pavement what is tarmac. Please come to look not just look at my photos

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dale Road, Crayford, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Uncollected road cones, 23rd September
item.description:
I ordered cones for the road for a funeral on November 2024 and despite reminding the council they are no longer needed they are Still by my front garden alone with two more that have been added. I would be grateful if they could be collected as I’m sure it will be costing the council money to keep replacing them. My address is Lincoln Close . DA82EB
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lincoln Close, North End, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pavement near, 23rd September
item.description:
Graffiti advertising Fitness First has appeared spraypainted up and down both pavements on Salusbury near the gym . It is offensive, distracting, unsightly and a public nuisance.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Salusbury Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet
